title: Font ID, please!
content:
I have been having a hard time trying to figure out what this font is... any help would be greatly appreciated!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017235857im_/http:/typophile.com/files/text_5696.jpg)
author: MichaG

comments.content:
@R.

If you keep answering font ID questions posted to the General Discussion forum, they'll keep posting here. Better to tell them to post in the correct forum.

Charles!!!!  
Perhaps if the instruction were reset:  
**All topics are welcome—BUT NOT FONT "ID" REQUESTS!!!!!!!!!!!!**  
...that might engender more compliance?!
Sorry, Charles, I usually don’t even notice that these postings are in the wrong forum. I’ll try to keep an eye on that.

Nick,

I prefer

All topics are welcome— **BUT FONT "ID" REQUESTS WILL BE MET WITH A DERISIVE CHORTLE!!!!!!!!!!!!**

That might be slightly incongruous with the original chortle:

"O frabjous day! Callooh! Callay!"  
He chortled in his joy.
In the interest of full disclosure we should point out that derisive chortling may be hazardous to your health.
